description: Defines the 'Note' model class for a note-taking application, including fields for title, content, timestamps, and a string representation method.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a single note entry with fields for title, content, creation and last update timestamps, and string representation.

methods.name: __str__(self)
methods.description: Returns the title of the note or a default string containing its primary key.

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content = models.TextField(blank=True, help_text="Content of the note.")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True, help_text="Timestamp when the note was /

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title = models.CharField(max_length=255, blank=True, default="", help_text="Title of the not/

ctags.name: updated_at
ctags.pattern: /^    updated_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True, help_text="Timestamp when the note was last/

fields.name: content = models.TextField(blank=True, help_text="Content of the note.")
created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True, help_text="Timestamp when the note was /
title = models.CharField(max_length=255, blank=True, default="", help_text="Title of the not/
updated_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True, help_text="Timestamp when the note was last/
